<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2012</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Listening Strategies:Ordering tickets</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörende Strategies:Ordering Karten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Billets d'écoute de Strategies:Ordering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Bilhetes escutando de Strategies:Ordering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Biglietti ascoltanti di Strategies:Ordering</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισιτήρια Strategies:Ordering ακούσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Boletos de Strategies:Ordering que escuchan</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a worksheet where English students improve their vocabulary related to ordering tickets for a concert, and learn words which they may also encounter in listening comprehension exercises. Includes some translations to hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tickets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist ein Bogen, in dem englische 
Kursteilnehmer ihren Wortschatz verbessern, der auf bestellenkarten 
für ein Konzert in Verbindung gestanden wird, und erlernt Wörter, 
die sie in hörenden Erfassenübungen auch antreffen können. 
Schließt einige Übersetzungen zum Hebräer ein</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est un tableau où les étudiants anglais 
améliorent leur vocabulaire lié aux billets de commande pour un 
concert, et apprend les mots qu'ils peuvent également rencontrer dans
des exercices d'écoute de compréhension. Inclut quelques 
traductions à l'hébreu</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma folha onde os estudantes ingleses 
melhorem seu vocabulário relacionado aos bilhetes requisitando para 
um concert, e aprende as palavras que podem também encontrar em 
exercícios escutando da compreensão. Inclui algumas 
traduções ao hebrew</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un foglio di lavoro in cui gli allievi 
inglesi migliorano il loro vocabolario relativo ai biglietti 
d'ordinamento per un concerto ed impara le parole che possono anche 
incontrare nelle esercitazioni ascoltanti di comprensione. 
Include alcune traduzioni ad ebreo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι ένα φύλλο εργασίας όπου οι αγγλικοί 
σπουδαστές βελτιώνουν το λεξιλόγιό τους σχετικό με τη διαταγή 
των εισιτηρίων για μια συναυλία, και μαθαίνουν τις λέξεις που 
μπορούν επίσης να αντιμετωπίσουν στις ασκήσεις κατανόησης 
ακούσματος. Περιλαμβάνει μερικές μεταφράσεις στα εβραϊκά</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una hoja de trabajo donde los estudiantes
ingleses mejoran su vocabulario relacionado con los boletos que 
ordenan para un concierto, y aprende las palabras que pueden también 
encontrar en ejercicios de la comprensión que escuchan. Incluye
algunas traducciones al hebreo</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">billets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">vocabulaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">bilhetes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">vocabulário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">biglietti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">vocabolario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εισιτήρια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λεξιλόγιο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">boletos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
